name: funny-people-belmont-appears-on-snl
title: Funny People: Belmont Appears On SNL
author: Christy Frink
contentEncoded:
In case you missed it last night, the fine folks at Saturday Night Live made a special non-Saturday night appearance on NBC to spoof Belmont’s Town Hall Debate. In what was probably one of the best SNL skits we’ve seen in years, the opening shot features none other than Belmont University’s Curb Event Center. We never thought we’d see the day.
